result.execSummary:
The defendant Sergio L Ratliff was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Domestic Abuse Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Credit For Time Served 99 Days.
Defendant IS NOT eligible for the Challenge Incarceration NOR the Substance Abuse Programs.

superMiscConds.notes:
DNA Surcharge Waived.

Cash Bail Applied.  The remaining cost to be paid as a Condition of Extended Supervision.

If Probation/Extended Supervision is revoked and/or a prison term ordered, outstanding financial obligations shall be collected pursuant to statutory provisions, including deductions from inmate prison monies.  If discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collections may include income assignment.
Maintain full time employment and/or school.

No contact with ex-wife.
No contact with minor children without Third party supervision.
Maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Submit to Random Urine Screens.
No use or possession of alcohol/drug paraphernalia/drugs without a valid prescription.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Sergio L Ratliff in court, in custody, with attorney Nicole M. Masnica.   Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Court orders the following: 
- Total sentence: 1 year 6 months (Initial Confinement: 1 year, Extended Supervision: 6 months). Credit for 99 days.
- Defendant IS NOT eligible for Challenge Incarceration
- Defendant IS NOT eligible for Substance Abuse Program
- Court costs of $343.00 to be paid as a Condition of Extended Supervision.
- DNA Surcharge waived.
- Conditions of Extended Supervision:  No contact with ex-wife.  No contact with minor children without 3rd party supervision.  Maintain full-time employment and/or school.  Maintain absolute sobriety/Random UAs.  No use or possession of alcohol/drug paraphernalia/drugs without a valid prescription.  Follow through with AODA treatment/counseling.
Filed by the Department of Corrections requesting an extension for the PSI due date. Approved by the Court, PSI due to the Court by September 8, 2014.
Sentencing hearing on September 12, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Sergio L Ratliff in court, in custody, with attorney Nicole M. Masnica.   Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Court orders presentence investigation to be completed and report filed within 30 days.  Court orders bail revoked.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 12, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Sergio L Ratliff in court, in custody, with attorney Nicole M. Masnica.   Barbara A. Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court addresses defendant's motion to modify bail.
